name: Ubiquiti UniFi Dream Machine Pro
description: Enterprise-grade network appliance with 10G SFP+ WAN, built-in UniFi controller, and IDS/IPS. Features expandable storage bay for UniFi Protect NVR functionality.

reviews.review_text: Home lab networking perfected. 10G WAN future-proofs.
Overkill for most but perfect for enthusiasts.
